events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The customer's request relates to a refund for a recent purchase due to incorrect sizing.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can assist you further?
Sure, my order number is 8796543210. The jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size.
We can process a full refund or offer an exchange for a larger size. Please let me know which option you prefer.
Thank you, I would prefer a refund instead of an exchange. Please proceed with it.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thank you for your quick and helpful support!
We are closing this case now. Please do not hesitate to contact us again if you need any further assistance.
We sent you a short survey to rate your support experience to help us improve our service.
